title: Nova E-Commerce
description: A high-performance headless e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 and Shopify Storefront API. Features include optimistic UI updates, server-side caching, and a custom cart engine.

title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for SaaS metrics. Implements real-time data streaming via WebSockets and interactive D3.js charts for user retention and revenue tracking.

title: Social Connect App
description: A cross-platform social networking application focusing on local community events. Built with React Native and Firebase, featuring geolocation services and real-time chat.

title: Creative Portfolio 3D
description: An immersive 3D portfolio experience using WebGL. Features interactive product showcases and smooth camera transitions powered by Three.js and React Three Fiber.

title: FinTech Wallet
description: A secure digital wallet interface for managing crypto and fiat currencies. Implements biometric authentication simulation and real-time currency conversion APIs.

title: AI Assistant Interface
description: A futuristic chat interface for an LLM-powered assistant. Features streaming text responses, code syntax highlighting, and voice command integration.
